title: An improved framework for efficiently modeling organic aerosol (OA) considering primary OA evaporation and secondary OA formation from VOCs, IVOCs, and SVOCs

Organic aerosols (OA) constitute an important fraction of fine particulate matter (PM2.5), yet accurate and efficient OA modeling within chemical transport models (CTM) remains a challenge. Volatility basis set (VBS)...
